UPDATE eka.mst_keluarga SET nama = upper(#nama#), lsre_id = #lsre_id#, tanggal_lahir = #tanggal_lahir#, usia = #usia#, kerja = upper(#pekerjaan#), nama_perusahaan = upper(#nama_perusahaan#), bidang_usaha = upper(#bidang#), npwp = #npwp#, penghasilan = #penghasilan#, ljb_id = #jabatan# WHERE reg_spaj = #strTmpSPAJ# and no = #no#

UPDATE eka.mst_client_new SET mcl_first = upper(#nama_pihak_ketiga#), mcl_jenis = #mcl_jenis#, tgl_pendirian_payer = #mspe_date_birth_3rd#, tpt_kedudukan_payer = upper(#tempat_lahir#) , mkl_kerja = #pekerjaan#, ljb_id = #jabatan#, mcl_npwp = #no_npwp#, mkl_pendanaan = #sumber_dana# , mkl_tujuan = #tujuan_dana# WHERE mcl_id = #mcl_id#

UPDATE eka.mst_client_new SET mcl_jenis = #mcl_jenis#, mcl_first = upper(#nama_pihak_ketiga#), mspe_email = upper(#email#), mspe_date_birth = #mspe_date_birth_3rd#, mspe_place_birth = upper(#tempat_lahir#), mkl_kerja = #pekerjaan#, ljb_id = #jabatan#, mcl_npwp = #no_npwp#, mkl_pendanaan = #sumber_dana#, mkl_tujuan = #tujuan_dana#, mkl_industri = #bidang_usaha_individu#, mkl_instansi_payer = #instansi# WHERE mcl_id = #mcl_id#

UPDATE eka.mst_address_new SET alamat_rumah = upper(#alamat_lengkap#), area_code_kantor = #area_code_kantor_3rd#, telpon_kantor = #telp_kantor#, area_code_rumah = #area_code_3rd#, telpon_rumah = #telp_rumah#, alamat_3rd = upper(#alamat_lengkap#), area_code_kantor_3rd = #area_code_kantor_3rd#, telpon_kantor_3rd = #telp_kantor#, lspr_id = #kewarganegaraan# WHERE mcl_id = #mcl_id#

update eka.mst_counter set msco_value = upper(trim(#lus_id#)) where msco_name like '%USER_ID%' and lca_id='01'

update eka.lst_user set cab_bank = upper(trim(#lcb_no_pil#)), LUS_FULL_NAME = upper(trim(#lus_full_name#)), VALID_BANK_1 = #spv1_name#, VALID_BANK_2 = #spv2_name# , LUS_EMAIL = upper(trim(#lus_email#)), LUS_ACTIVE = #lus_active# where LUS_ID = upper(trim(#lus_id#))

UPDATE eka.mst_trans_history set TGL_PERKIRAAN_LAHIR = to_date(#hpl#,'dd/mm/yyyy') where reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ')
UPDATE eka.MST_FREE_SPAJ SET reg_spaj_free = #spajFree# process_type = #process_type# WHERE reg_spaj_primary =#spajReff#
UPDATE eka.mst_insured SET mste_flag_special_offer = #flag_special_offer# WHERE reg_spaj = #spaj#
UPDATE eka.MST_CRP_RESULT SET answer_id = #answer_id# WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#regspaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') and question_id = #question_id#
UPDATE eka.MST_POLICY SET MSPO_CRP_SCORE = #mspocrpscore# , MSPO_CRP_RESULT = #mspocrpresult# WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#regspaj#, '.'), 11, ' ')
UPDATE EKA.LST_MEMBER set flag_production = '0' where noid = #noid#
UPDATE EKA.LST_MEMBER set flag_payment = '0' where noid = #noid#

UPDATE eka.mst_invoice SET msinv_no_jm = #no_jm# WHERE REG_SPAJ =#spaj# AND MSBI_PREMI_KE = #premiKe# AND MSBI_TAHUN_KE = 1

update eka.MST_BATCH_PEMBAYARAN set USER_APP_1 = #user# ,DATE_APP_1 = #date# ,APP_1 = #status# ,ME_ID_1 = #me_id#
USER_APP_2 = #user# ,DATE_APP_2 = #date# ,APP_2 = #status# ,ME_ID_2 = #me_id#

update eka.mst_pembayaran_api set flag_aktif = 1 where batch_no = #batch_no# and payment_method = 3 and flag_aktif = 0
update eka.mst_pembayaran_api set flag_aktif = 2 where batch_no = #batch_no# and payment_method = 3 and flag_aktif = 0
